mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where we believe your worth is measured by the size of your ego and the depth of your pockets. Get ready for the VIP treatment you deserve!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I was at a fancy restaurant, living my best life, when I realized they gave me sparkling water instead of still. Can you believe it? I summoned the manager, demanded a public apology, and insisted they comped my entire meal. And you know what? They did! Because why should I settle for anything less than perfection? It's tough being this fabulous, but hey, someone's gotta show the world how it's done.
